text: (Marumai nalil) nam'maic cantippatai evarkal nampavillaiyo avarkal, â€˜â€˜enkal mitu (neratiyakave) vanavarkal irakkappata ventama? Allatu (enkal kankalal) enkal iraivanaip parkka ventama?'' Enru kurukinranar. Ivarkal tankalai mika mikap peritaka ennikkontu alavu katantu (perum pavattil cenru) vittanar
